00010 *  NOTE: Some comments in this file are from original code.

00014 /*
00015 *********************************************************************************************************
00016 *                                             INCLUDE FILES
00017 *********************************************************************************************************

00019 #include "hw_init.h"
00020 #include "hw_lcd.h"
00021 
00022 /*$PAGE*/
00023 /*
00024 *********************************************************************************************************
00025 *                                        PollBusyFlags
00026 *
00027 * Description: This function polls the LCD Busy Flag. Private function.
00028 *
00029 * Arguments  : none
00030 *
00031 * Returns    : none
00032 *
00033 * Note(s)    : 
00034 *********************************************************************************************************
00035 */
00036 static void PollBusyFlag()
00037 {
00038    /* Release buffer */
00039    P5OUT = LCD_OUT2IN;
00040 
00041    /* Enter read mode */
00042    P4OUT |= LCD_RW;
00043 
00044    /* Busy flag/address register */
00045    P4OUT &= ~LCD_RS;
00046 
00047    /* Wait two instructions */
00048    nop();
00049    nop();
00050 
00051    /* Enable read */
00052    P4OUT |= LCD_EN;
00053 
00054    /* Poll pin (although interrupt operation is possible) */
00055    while ((LCD_BUSY & P1IN) == 0)
00056        ;
00057 
00058    /* Disable read */
00059    P4OUT &= ~LCD_EN;
00060    nop();
00061    nop();
00062 
00063    /* Exit read mode */
00064    P4OUT &= ~LCD_RW;
00065 }
00066 
00067 /*$PAGE*/
00068 /*
00069 *********************************************************************************************************
00070 *                                        TransferDataToLCD
00071 *
00072 * Description: Helper function that writes a command on the LCD screen.  Private function.
00073 *
00074 * Arguments  : data -- data that needs to be sent to the LCD controller.
00075 *
00076 * Returns    : none
00077 *
00078 * Note(s)    : 
00079 *********************************************************************************************************
00080 */
00081 static void TransferDataToLCD(unsigned int data)
00082 {
00083    /* Put content on the LCD pins */
00084    P5OUT = data;
00085    nop();
00086    P4OUT |= LCD_EN;
00087    nop();
00088    nop();
00089    P4OUT &= ~(LCD_EN);
00090     
00091    /* Check for LCD status = ready */
00092    PollBusyFlag();
00093 }
00094 
00095 /*$PAGE*/
00096 /*
00097 *********************************************************************************************************
00098 *                                        InitLCD
00099 *
00100 * Description: Initializes the LCD
00101 *
00102 * Arguments  : none
00103 *
00104 * Returns    : none
00105 *
00106 * Note(s)    : 
00107 *********************************************************************************************************
00108 */
00109 void InitLCD()
00110 {
00111    /* This is the datasheet software initalization procedure
00112     * enable is active high.
00113     */
00114    P4OUT &= ~(LCD_RS|LCD_RW|LCD_EN);
00115     
00116    /* Wait */
00117    delay(LCD_INIT_WAIT0);
00118 
00119    /* SW init step 1    -       wait >4.1ms */
00120    P5OUT = LCD_INIT; 
00121    nop();
00122    P4OUT |= LCD_EN;
00123    nop(); /* PW_EH min=450ns @ MCLK 7.3728 MHz ~= 4 Instr Cycles; nop=2 */
00124    nop(); 
00125    P4OUT &= ~(LCD_EN);
00126    delay(LCD_INIT_WAIT1);
00127     
00128    /* SW init step 2 - wait >100us */
00129    P5OUT = LCD_INIT;
00130    nop(); 
00131    P4OUT |= LCD_EN;
00132    nop();
00133    nop();
00134    P4OUT &= ~(LCD_EN);
00135    delay(LCD_INIT_WAIT0);
00136    P2OUT |= DISP_C;
00137 
00138    /* SW init step 3 - after command is written, BF (Busy Flag can be checked) */
00139    P5OUT = LCD_INIT;
00140    nop();
00141    P4OUT |= LCD_EN;
00142    nop();
00143    nop();
00144    P4OUT &= ~(LCD_EN);
00145 
00146    /* Check busy flag... accessed through open collector inverter 0 = busy */
00147    PollBusyFlag();
00148 
00149    /* Do function set (8/4 bit interface, number of display lines, display font) */
00150    P5OUT = LCD_FUNSET; 
00151    nop();
00152    P4OUT |= LCD_EN;
00153    nop();
00154    nop();
00155    P4OUT &= ~(LCD_EN);
00156    PollBusyFlag();
00157 
00158    /* Do display off */
00159    P5OUT = LCD_OFF;
00160    nop();
00161    P4OUT |= LCD_EN;
00162    nop();
00163    nop();
00164    P4OUT &= ~(LCD_EN);
00165    PollBusyFlag();
00166 
00167    /* Do clear display */
00168    P5OUT = LCD_CLR;
00169    nop();
00170    P4OUT |= LCD_EN;
00171    nop();
00172    nop();
00173    P4OUT &= ~(LCD_EN);
00174    PollBusyFlag();
00175 
00176    /* Do entry mode set */
00177    P5OUT = LCD_EMS;
00178    nop();
00179    P4OUT |= LCD_EN;
00180    nop();
00181    nop();
00182    P4OUT &= ~(LCD_EN);
00183    PollBusyFlag();
00184 
00185    /* Do display on */
00186    P5OUT = LCD_ON;
00187    nop();
00188    P4OUT |= LCD_EN;
00189    nop();
00190    nop();
00191    P4OUT &= ~(LCD_EN);
00192    PollBusyFlag();
00193 }
00194 
00195 /*$PAGE*/
00196 /*
00197 *********************************************************************************************************
00198 *                                        SetDisplyDDRAMPosition
00199 *
00200 * Description: Set LCD cursor position.
00201 *
00202 * Arguments  : position-- position in the DDRAM
00203 *
00204 * Returns    : none
00205 *
00206 * Note(s)    : 
00207 *********************************************************************************************************
00208 */
00209 void SetDisplyDDRAMPosition(unsigned int position)
00210 {
00211    P4OUT &= ~(LCD_RW|LCD_RS);
00212 
00213    /* Mask the position value */
00214    position |= 0x80;
00215  
00216    TransferDataToLCD(position); 
00217 }
00218 
00219 /*$PAGE*/
00220 /*
00221 *********************************************************************************************************
00222 *                                        ClearLCD
00223 *
00224 * Description: This function clears the LCD. 
00225 *
00226 * Arguments  : none
00227 *
00228 * Returns    : none
00229 *
00230 * Note(s)    : 
00231 *********************************************************************************************************
00232 */
00233 void ClearLCD()
00234 {
00235    TransferDataToLCD(LCD_CLR);
00236 }
00237 
00238 /*$PAGE*/
00239 /*
00240 *********************************************************************************************************
00241 *                                        SetLCDCursorPosition
00242 *
00243 * Description: Sets the LCD position to Line number
00244 *
00245 * Arguments  : position-- Where the cursor should be placed.
00246 *
00247 * Returns    : none
00248 *
00249 * Note(s)    : 
00250 *********************************************************************************************************
00251 */
00252 void SetLCDCursorPosition(unsigned int position)
00253 {
00254    if (position == LCD_HOME)
00255    {
00256       TransferDataToLCD(LCD_HOME);
00257    }
00258    else
00259    {
00260       position |= 0x80;
00261       TransferDataToLCD(position);          
00262    }
00263 }
00264 
00265 /*$PAGE*/
00266 /*
00267 *********************************************************************************************************
00268 *                                        WriteCharToLCD
00269 *
00270 * Description: Write a zero (null) terminated string to the LCD.
00271 *
00272 * Arguments  : character -- a character that will be sent to the LCD
00273 *
00274 * Returns    : none
00275 *
00276 * Note(s)    : 
00277 *********************************************************************************************************
00278 */
00279 void WriteCharToLCD(char character)
00280 {
00281    /* Write data to DRAM */
00282    P4OUT &= ~LCD_RW;
00283    P4OUT |= LCD_RS;
00284    P5OUT = character;
00285    nop();
00286    P4OUT |= LCD_EN;
00287    nop();
00288    nop();
00289    P4OUT &= ~LCD_EN;
00290    PollBusyFlag();
00291 }
00292 
00293 /*$PAGE*/
00294 /*
00295 *********************************************************************************************************
00296 *                                        WriteStringToLCD
00297 *
00298 * Description: Write a zero (null) terminated string to the LCD.
00299 *
00300 * Arguments  : a pointer to a zero-terminated (NULL) string.
00301 *
00302 * Returns    : none
00303 *
00304 * Note(s)    : 
00305 *********************************************************************************************************
00306 */
00307 void WriteStringToLCD(const char* msg)
00308 {
00309    /* While we have character we writing it out */
00310    while (*msg != 0)
00311       WriteCharToLCD(*msg++);
00312 }
